>>Weather Grožnjan

The climatic conditions in Grožnjan are characterized by a warm and temperate atmosphere. There is significant rainfall throughout the year in Grožnjan. Even the driest month still has a lot of rainfall. The Köppen-Geiger climate classification identifies this particular weather pattern as belonging to the category of Cfa. The average temperature in Grožnjan is 13.9 °C | 56.9 °F. Approximately 1313 mm | 51.7 inch of rainfall occurs on a yearly basis.

Grožnjan are in the northern hemisphere. Summer starts here at the end of June and ends in September. There are the months of summer: June, July, August, September. The best time to visit is July, August.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Grožnjan

The month characterized by the lowest precipitation levels is July, exhibiting a mere 67 mm | 2.6 inch of rainfall. Most precipitation falls in November, with an average of 178 mm | 7.0 inch.

average temperature by month Grožnjan

On average, the month of July experiences the highest temperature with an average value of 23.6 °C | 74.4 °F. In January, the average temperature is 4.7 °C | 40.4 °F. It is the lowest average temperature of the whole year.

There is a notable fluctuation in precipitation, with 111 mm | 4 inch variance observed between the month of least rainfall and that of highest downpour. The average temperatures vary during the year by 18.9 °C | 34.0 °F.

The month with the highest relative humidity is November (75.39 %). The month with the lowest relative humidity is July (65.44 %). The month with the highest number of rainy days is November (13.10 days). The month with the lowest number of rainy days is August (8.20 days).

In Grožnjan, the month with the most daily hours of sunshine is July with an average of 12.89 hours of sunshine. In total there are 399.45 hours of sunshine throughout July.

The month with the fewest daily hours of sunshine in Grožnjan is January with an average of 5.23 hours of sunshine a day. In total there are 162.27 hours of sunshine in January.

Around 3240.64 hours of sunshine are counted in Grožnjan throughout the year. On average there are 106.39 hours of sunshine per month.
